description: A casual cotton pant that holds it down around town but can still rally for redpoint attempts, multi-pitch climbs and weekends in camp, the J Tree™ Belted Pant has both durability and aesthetics worthy of its namesake. The durable cotton ripstop fabric withstands days in the desert and obligatory offwidths, while the articulated fit and gusseted construction allow full range of motion for slopey mantles and sunset scrambles.
name: Mountain Hardwear J Tree Belted Pants, Short - Mens
